title: Vibeify Prompt Output Schema v1
description: Validates the structured envelope around an LLM-generated prompt output. This schema applies to execution output, not prompt templates or prompt inputs.

promptId.description: Stable identifier of the prompt version that produced this output.

promptClass.description: Classification of the prompt used during execution.

output.description: The primary model output. May be text, markdown, JSON, or code.

warnings.description: Non-fatal issues detected during validation or execution.

errors.description: Fatal issues that prevented full success.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the prompt was executed.

runId.description: Optional unique identifier for this execution run.
